remarks.para: May be inoperative or missing provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: Prior to each takeoff and departure, the crew will review takeoff and maneuvering airspeeds. Prior to each approach and landing, the crew will review landing and maneuvering airspeeds.

placard.para: Placard next to Mach/Airspeed Indicator(s) "EXTERNAL AIRSPEED BUGS MISSING" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
